translations: 使醒悟，使不受欺骗（undeceive 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Your behaviour soon undeceived me as to your true intentions.
sentences.translation: 你的行为很快让我明白了你的真实意图。

sentences.sentence: Oh, nothing, ' he suddenly undeceived and returned to the reality.
sentences.translation: 啊，没什么。'他幡然醒悟，重返现实。

sentences.sentence: His unusual behaviour soon undeceived me of my stupid belief that he was an electrician.
sentences.translation: 他行为异常使我很快意识到，他是个电工的看法是愚蠢的。
